ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the detail of the [FATEST], if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: FATSTDTL
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: It is recommended that the test detail name be pre-printed on the CRF. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as Test, Test Name can be included as the column header.
